price: 5. Nabiyow ku Rabbi ku buxak cakkil koo kah yeyyeeqe innah, diggah moominiinik horta Qeebih tawqem mafaxxaay niqbih.
arabic: كَمَآ أَخۡرَجَكَ رَبُّكَ مِنۢ بَيۡتِكَ بِٱلۡحَقِّ وَإِنَّ فَرِيقٗا مِّنَ ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ لَكَٰرِهُونَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: kamā akhrajaka rabbuka min baytika bil-ḥaqi wa-inna farīqan mina al-mu'minīna lakārihūna
